thread.title: Auburn student earns year of free tuition with halfcourt granny shot
thread.title_full: Auburn student earns year of free tuition with halfcourt granny shot

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Auburn student earns year of free tuition with halfcourt granny shot
text:
Nailed it.
Auburn men’s basketball may have lost to Arkansas Saturday, but Auburn student Ben Bode won big:
Bode, a junior, was called to the court at halftime for a halfcourt shot contest for free tuition. After executing a perfect granny throw, Bode sunk the shot and secured a free year of school.
The crowd goes extremely wild, and Bode celebrates in the most heartwarming way:
The SEC Network even showed footage of head football coach Gus Malzahn asking Bode for a picture. 
If you’re going to have 15 minutes of fame, earning a year’s worth of free tuition is the way to do it.
